content:
I got this error doing an IG -build

    Connect to Terminology Server at http://tx.fhir.org/r3                           (18.0218sec)
    Publishing Content Failed: Error sending Http Request: Connect to tx.fhir.org:80 timed out (53.0634sec)
                                                                             (53.0636sec)
I remember I was able to run locally without internet. but I have forgotten. can anybody remind me?
is there a way to run offline like with the build?
You can specify an alternate terminology server. Not sure if NA works, but if it did, the guide wouldn't gen the vocab part correctly
sorry for the delay in responding to this - I'm at Cerner Health Conference, and off line quite a bit..
